definition: to investigate and handle (a criminal case)
to research/to check/to investigate/to examine/to refer to/to look up (e.g. a word in a dictionary)
to do/to manage/to handle/to go about/to run/to set up/to deal with

sentences.english: Judicial accounting technology is a specialism means to investigate and prosecute economic crime case.
sentences.chinese: 司法會計技術是查辦經濟犯罪案件的專門手段。

sentences.english: Criminal punishment has been intensified, and a batch of big and vital cases have been dealt with.
sentences.chinese: 強化刑事打擊，查辦了一批大案要案。

sentences.english: Xie one month ago participated and assisted the investigation of corruption against the county's Deputy Secretary.
sentences.chinese: 謝一個月前參與協助查辦該縣副書記貪腐案。

sentences.english: The corrupt mayor should be removed from office and prosecuted.
sentences.chinese: 這個腐化墮落的市長應當撤職查辦。

sentences.english: This company has been stopped for an audit because of its messy management and tolerance of misconduct.
sentences.chinese: 這家公司管理混亂藏污納垢，已經停業查辦了。

sentences.english: Chinese law and judicial organs shall punish intervention units.
sentences.chinese: 中國法律與司法機關單位應介入查辦。
